Comment: Well, I think each side has very different win-conditions. For the US side it's all about money. For China it is not about money at all, but face and nationalism. The US does not have the cohesion and unity to impose its win-condition on anyone, and certainly not to suffer for it. China has the popular and administrative resolve to suffer pain to reinforce its own status and prestige because outside forces did something to China.   So, yeah. Not looking good for Donald.
Author: MaxieQ

So China is clearly winning although it is not exactly a clean victory, and ultimately they have very little to do with it because it is more the United States just choosing to lose.
